refnamediv.refpurpose: Applies a patch to a JSON document

refsection.title: Introduction
refsection.para: This step applies the provided patch to the source document, returning the patched result.

refsection.title: Errors
refsection.para: Errors from the entry body are summarized here.

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: This step uses the json-patch library version to apply the JSON Patch document provided on the patch port to the source document. The resulting patched document is returned.
If merge is false, the patch is used as a JSON Patch ().
If merge is true, the patch is used as a JSON Merge Patch ().
The cx:json-diff step can be used to compute a patch between two JSON documents.
